kodkod.util.nodes

Class Nodes

  • java.lang.Object
    • kodkod.util.nodes.Nodes

  • public final class Nodes
extends Object
    Provides utility methods for extracting roots (top-level) conjuncts of Kodkod formulas
    Author:
    Emina Torlak

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Set<Formula> allRoots(Formula formula, Collection<? extends Node> descendants)
      Returns all roots of the given formula such that a node in the given collection is reachable from that root.
      static Set<Formula> conjuncts(Formula formula)
      Returns an unmodifiable set consisting of the children of the given formula, if the formula is a binary or an nary conjunction.
      static Set<Formula> minRoots(Formula formula, Collection<? extends Node> descendants)
      Returns a minimal subset of roots of the given formula such that all nodes in the given collection are reachable from those roots.
      static Set<Formula> roots(Formula formula)
      Returns the roots of the given formula.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • allRoots

        public static Set<Formula> allRoots(Formula formula,
                    Collection<? extends Node> descendants)
        Returns all roots of the given formula such that a node in the given collection is reachable from that root.
        Returns:
        { r: roots(formula) | some r.*components & descendants.elements }

      • conjuncts

        public static Set<Formula> conjuncts(Formula formula)
        Returns an unmodifiable set consisting of the children of the given formula, if the formula is a binary or an nary conjunction. Otherwise returns a singleton set containing the formula itself.
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable set consisting of children of the given formula, if the formula is a binary or an nary conjunction. Otherwise returns a singleton set containing the formula itself.

      • minRoots

        public static Set<Formula> minRoots(Formula formula,
                    Collection<? extends Node> descendants)
        Returns a minimal subset of roots of the given formula such that all nodes in the given collection are reachable from those roots. The returned subset is a local minimum in that none of its members can be removed without leaving some node in the descendants set unreachable from the remaining roots.
        Requires:
        descendants in formula.*components
        Returns:
        { s: Set | s.elements in roots(formula) and descendants in s.elements.*components and no s': Set | s.containsAll(s') and s'.size()
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - descendants !in formula.*components

      • roots

        public static Set<Formula> roots(Formula formula)
        Returns the roots of the given formula. In other words, breaks up the given formula into its conjunctive components, {f0, ..., fk}, such that, for all 0<=i<=k, fi is not a conjunction and [[f0 && ... && fk]] <=> [[formula]].
        Returns:
        subformulas, {f0, ..., fk}, of the given formula such that, for all 0<=i<=k, fi is not a conjuction and [[f0 && ... && fk]] <=> [[formula]].
